lyrics.lyrictitle: Aoi Tori wa Itsu mo Human-ge

lyric.verse: Tooi tooi hi ni Otozureta shima wa PAPA to MAMA no nioi HEART no raku ga kisaru tama made Kuri keashi miru Kinoo no yume no HANA SHI
lyric.chorus: Aa, futari wa yume no aida wo yureteru Aa, kikasete otogibanashi wo kikasete Tada tsugi no hi futari no sora ga mireru yoo ni Hidari no mimi ni sawatte Aa, naiteru PIANO mitai ni naiteru Aa, odokete kogumamitai ni odokete Hanikamiya no MONSTER-san
lyric.verse: Amai amai hi ni Sasayaita uta wa Kimi to boku dake no himitsu Kabe no nai heya de
lyric.chorus: Aa, kokoro wa mukidashi no mama furuete Aa, yamete yo furidashita ame wo yamete Mata togireta kotoba ga ai ni kawaru yoo ni GARAGARA hebi no koi wa Tonari no kuni no uwasa Aa, futari wa yume no aida wo nagereta Aa, ashita mo tooku de kawa wa wakareru Aoi tori no human wa IKAreta mori ni hibi ku
